id.description: User ID of the player, ensuring one best score per player.

distance.description: The best distance achieved by the player in meters.

time_ms.description: The time taken to achieve the best distance, in milliseconds.

coins.description: Total number of Line Coins the player has.

owned_palettes.description: An array of palette keys that the user owns.

equipped_palette.description: The key of the currently equipped palette.

owned_songs.description: An array of song keys that the user owns.

equipped_song.description: The key of the currently equipped song.

equipped_death_effect.description: The key of the currently equipped death effect.
